title: ICT Utilization Strategies for Inclusive Science Instruction

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary science education fundamentals and smartphone utilization skills
context.additional_context: Online workshop for corporate elementary science education coordinators

learning_goals: Learners can design three science class activities based on Universal Design for Learning (UDL) principles.
Learners can create inclusive science learning materials using smartphone-based ICT tools.
Learners can propose at least two formative assessment methods that consider diverse learners' needs.

resources: UDL (Universal Design for Learning) Guidelines Materials
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
